gene.function: FUNCTION: Plays a role in the organization of endoplasmic reticulum exit sites. Specifically binds to phosphatidylinositol 3-phosphate (PI(3)P), phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate (PI(4)P) and phosphatidylinositol 5-phosphate (PI(5)P). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:10400679, ECO:0000269|PubMed:15623529, ECO:0000269|PubMed:22922100}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasmic vesicle, COPII-coated vesicle membrane; Peripheral membrane protein; Cytoplasmic side. Endoplasmic reticulum {ECO:0000305}.
geneOntologyCellularComponent: COPII-coated ER to Golgi transport vesicle [GO:0030134]
ER to Golgi transport vesicle membrane [GO:0012507]
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: endoplasmic reticulum to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport [GO:0006888]
